amendment.description: Amendment clarifies the process used by the advisory committee to recommend candidates to serve as independent directors on the boards of each of the Federal Home Loan Banks.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 22(1) printed in the Congressional Record to clarify recommendations on criteria for the Federal Housing Enterprise Board when appointing individuals as directors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kanjorski amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
